meta.title: AI Itinerary Generator — Smart Day-by-Day Travel Plans | MonkeyTravel
meta.description: Generate complete travel itineraries with AI in 30 seconds. Day-by-day plans with real venues, current prices, and smart time blocks. Free, no signup required.

hero.title: The AI Itinerary Generator That Plans Like a Pro
hero.subtitle: Enter a destination and get a complete day-by-day itinerary with real venues, current prices, and optimized time blocks — all generated by AI in under 30 seconds.

features.title: Powerful AI Itinerary Generation
features.subtitle: Our AI doesn't just suggest places — it builds complete, structured itineraries you can actually follow.

smartItineraries.title: Smart AI Itineraries
smartItineraries.description: Advanced algorithms analyze thousands of data points to create perfectly structured day-by-day plans with morning, afternoon, and evening time blocks.

realTimeData.title: Real-Time Venue Data
realTimeData.description: Every restaurant, attraction, and hotel is verified with current ratings, prices, and opening hours. No outdated or fictional recommendations.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable Plans
customizable.description: Swap activities, adjust time slots, change budget tiers. Your AI-generated itinerary is a starting point you can make entirely your own.

multiCity.title: Multi-City Trip Support
multiCity.description: Planning a multi-stop journey? Generate connected itineraries across multiple cities with logical routing between destinations.

offlineAccess.title: Offline Access
offlineAccess.description: Download your generated itinerary to your device. Access your day-by-day plans even without an internet connection while traveling.

exportShare.title: Export & Share
exportShare.description: Export your itinerary as PDF, share a link with travel companions, or sync with your calendar. Your trip plans, everywhere you need them.

step1.title: Enter Your Trip Details
step1.description: Tell us your destination, travel dates, budget preference, and interests. The more detail, the better your itinerary.

step2.title: AI Generates Your Itinerary
step2.description: Our AI engine builds a complete day-by-day plan in under 30 seconds — with real venues, time blocks, and three budget tiers to compare.

step3.title: Customize & Export
step3.description: Fine-tune your itinerary, export it as PDF, share with friends, or download for offline access. Your perfect trip, ready to go.

comparison.title: MonkeyTravel vs. Generic AI
comparison.subtitle: ChatGPT and Gemini give text lists. MonkeyTravel generates structured, actionable itineraries.

dayByDay.label: Day-by-day structure
dayByDay.monkey: Organized by day with morning/afternoon/evening blocks

realVenues.label: Verified venues
realVenues.monkey: Real places with current prices & ratings
realVenues.chatgpt: Often includes closed or fictional venues

timeBlocks.label: Time optimization
timeBlocks.monkey: Smart routing minimizes travel between activities
timeBlocks.chatgpt: No geographic logic or time management

budgetOptions.label: Budget tiers
budgetOptions.chatgpt: One generic suggestion with no price data

exportOptions.label: Export & sharing
exportOptions.monkey: PDF export, shareable links, calendar sync

whatIsIt.question: What is an AI itinerary generator?
whatIsIt.answer: An AI itinerary generator uses artificial intelligence to automatically create complete, day-by-day travel plans based on your destination, dates, budget, and preferences. MonkeyTravel's generator goes further by including real venue data, current prices, smart routing, and multiple budget options — not just a generic list of suggestions.

howFast.question: How fast does it generate an itinerary?
howFast.answer: MonkeyTravel generates a complete day-by-day itinerary in under 30 seconds. You'll get three budget tiers (Budget, Balanced, Premium) with real venues, prices, and optimized time blocks — all ready to customize or export immediately.

howAccurate.question: How accurate are the generated itineraries?
howAccurate.answer: MonkeyTravel uses real-time venue data including current ratings, prices, and opening hours from trusted sources. Unlike generic AI chatbots that may hallucinate or suggest closed venues, our itineraries reference actual, verified places. We recommend confirming details close to your travel date.

multiCity.question: Can it generate multi-city itineraries?
multiCity.answer: Yes. MonkeyTravel supports multi-city trip planning. You can generate connected itineraries that cover multiple destinations in a single trip, with logical routing and transition days between cities.

exportFormats.question: Can I export or share my itinerary?
exportFormats.answer: Absolutely. You can export your generated itinerary as a PDF, share it via a unique link with travel companions, or sync it to your calendar. You can also download it for offline access while traveling.

isFree.question: Is the AI itinerary generator free?
isFree.answer: Yes, MonkeyTravel's AI itinerary generator is completely free. You can generate unlimited itineraries with no credit card required, no trial period, and no hidden fees. All features — including export, sharing, and multi-city support — are included at no cost.

cta.title: Ready to Generate Your Itinerary?
cta.subtitle: Let AI build your perfect trip plan in 30 seconds. Real venues, smart routing, three budget tiers — completely free.
